text: Colleen Bolton (born 19 March 1957) is an Australian cross-country skier. She competed in two events at the 1980 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Australian female cross- country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Australia Category:Cross-country skiers at the 1980 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Colleen Bolton
